transArray.content: The location is excellent and the transportation is convenient. The front desk was very welcoming and considerate when I checked in. I was very satisfied with the room arranged by the front desk. It was also very clean and the wireless speed in the room was also very fast! ! The sound insulation effect is good!
Dear guest, thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to share your stay experience. You are a little man with a gentleness that is concealed by your publicity. I love you.
